Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite  (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
OFFICE OF THE CAMPUS REGISTRAR
This is to certify that Cavite State University – Tanza Campus has no record of enrolled
foreign students from Academic Year 2020 to 2022.
This certification is issued for accreditation purposes only.
th Issued this 8 day of November 2022.
NOEMI A. PERIDA Campus Registrar
